name: G.I. Joe Action Figure 1/12 Duke Deluxe Edition 16 cm
description:
One:12 Collective G.I. Joe: Duke - Deluxe Edition

Enter Duke, the fearless field commander of the G.I. Joe team and latest addition to the One:12 Collective!

The One:12 Collective Duke is lock and loaded, outfitted in a sergeant shirt, a scarf, a removable chest harness, cargo pants, sturdy combat boots, and a utility belt that offers storage for his weaponry. The all-American hero features three interchangeable head portraits with varying expressions and thirteen interchangeable hands for dynamic poses.

Unleash the firepower with an impressive arsenal: Duke is equipped with a grenade launcher, a machine gun, a handgun, six hand grenades in two distinct styles, a knife, and multiple weapon FX. He comes complete with military gear including his signature helmet, a walkie-talkie, a foldable shovel, binoculars, a canteen, and a versatile backpack with various storage options.

By leading his fellow Joes into battle and standing up to the nefarious forces of Cobra, Duke's unyielding determination and commitment for justice have made him a timeless and beloved symbol of heroism.

THE ONE:12 COLLECTIVE DUKE FEATURES:
- One:12 Collective body with over 32 points of articulation
- 3x interchangeable head portraits
- Hand painted authentic detailing
- Approximately 17 cm tall
- 13x interchangeable hands
- 1x pair of gun trigger hands (L&R)
- 1x pair of holding hands (L&R)
- 1x pair of fists (L&R)
- 1x gun cradle hand (L)
- 1x relaxed hand (L)
- 1x action grabbing hand (L)
- 1x pointing hand (L)
- 1x salute hand (R)
- 1x action pose hand (R)
- 1x binocular/canteen holding hand (R)


COSTUME:
- Sergeant shirt
- Scarf
- Chest harness (removable)
- Utility belt (removable)
- Cargo pants
- Combat boots


ACCESSORIES:
- 1x backpack
- 1x walkie-talkie
- 1x helmet
- 1x knife with sheath (attaches to belt)
- 1x handgun
- 1x gun holster (attaches to belt)
- 1x removable clips for gun
- 1x machine gun
- 2x machine gun clips
- 2x gun FX
- 1x mud splash
- 1x grenade launcher
- 2x removable clips for launcher
- 1x tripod (attaches to launcher)
- 1x grenade FX
- 6x grenades in two (2) styles (attach to belt)
- 1x foldable shovel (attaches to backpack)
- 1x binoculars
- 1x canteen
- 1x One:12 Collective display base with logo
- 1x One:12 Collective adjustable display post


Each One:12 Collective G.I. Joe: Duke - Deluxe Edition figure is packaged in a collector-friendly box, designed with collectors in mind.
